title: Tasty Pita Bread Salad Bowl Recipe
content:
This pita bread salad bowl is filling and tastes amazing. It has all the elements you need. The pita bread is crunchy and the veggies are fresh and the sauce is tangy.
 
Pita Bread Salad Bowl Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 10 mins
Total time: 20
